item.title: Infinite integrals in terms of series
item.description: arXiv:2506.19867v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this work we derive and evaluate some infinite integrals involving the product of a generalized logarithm and polynomial functions in the denominator. These integrals are expressed in terms of finite series involving the Hurwitz-Lerch zeta function. We produce special cases of these integrals in terms of other special functions and fundamental constants.
item.dc:creator: Robert Reynolds
